show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: October 4, 2010
content:
Dr. <!--more--> Breggin’s guest is New York City clinical psychologist Sarton Weinraub, PhD who discusses bringing out the best in ourselves as therapists and making the most out of therapy as clients and patients.
   Dr Weinraub critiques psychoanalysis and encourages person-centered, empathic approaches.
